testcase.name: Math works
should allow access with a valid JWT token
should deny access with no token
should deny access with an invalid token
should deny access with an expired token
GET /api/health should return status ok
GET / should return welcome message
POST /api/messages should create a new message
GET /api/messages/chats should return chat history
GET /api/messages should return messages for a chat
DELETE /api/messages/chats/:chatId should delete all messages in a chat
should register a new user with valid data
should return 400 if email is already registered
should return 400 if email format is invalid
should return 400 if password does not meet requirements
should log in a user with valid credentials
should return 401 if email is not registered
should return 401 if password is incorrect
should log out a user successfully
Data should persist across MongoDB container restarts
